detail_desc: Short viscose tunic in a plumeti weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Ties at the waist and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with decorative buttons down the front and a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt. Concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, long puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lace trim at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.

Short dress in airy, softly draping chiffon with a V-neck and seam under the bust. Long, wide puff sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam above the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Flared, airy skirt. Jersey lining.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Fully lined swimsuit with a text print on the front, racer back and cut-out section at the back.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with elasticated cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Shirt in a striped premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Plastic smartphone case with real pressed flowers.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a raw-edge, asymmetric hem.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Shirt jacket in jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and skinny legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed shawl collar with a button at the front, side pockets and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, boxy jumper with cable-knit sections, a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse woven in an airy linen blend with a square neckline front and back, buttons down the front, puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and ends, and a flared peplum.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in cotton jersey with covered elastication and a frill trim at the waist, a decorative bow at the front, and side pockets.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. These pared-back joggers are made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. They have covered elastication at the waist and hems, jersey-lined pockets in the side seams and an open back pocket.
Block-coloured, knee-length swim shorts in a stretch weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fly with a hook and loop fastener and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with elastication and a small frill at the waist and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in a soft rib knit with long trumpet sleeves and embroidered cuffs.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a flock print motif on the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and cuffed hems.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Two-strand necklace in different designs of metal chains. One is slightly longer. Adjustable length, 35.5-43.5 cm.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Side pockets, back pockets and a pocket on one leg.
Fitted, off-the shoulder top in a fine rib knit with a wide lace trim at the top and long sleeves.
Top in sturdy, stretch fabric with a sweetheart neckline. Concealed elastication over the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a straight hem.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Bag in transparent and shimmering metallic plastic with a text print and two handles at the top. Size 7x28x32 cm.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with pattern-knit sections and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a wide neckline and rounded hem.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.

High-waisted sports tights in sturdy, fast-drying, functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the waist, hips, seat and thighs. Taped seams on the outside of the legs and a wide waistband with a concealed key pocket.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels,a button at the front, chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with shell-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Sports jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front,and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fully lined swimsuit with shaped, padded cups, a wrapover top, seam under the bust and low-cut back. Gathers in the side seams for best fit. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist with twisted ties, and a flounce at the hem. Jersey inner skirt.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, frill trim around the neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length, washed denim jeans with a high paper bag waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.
Sandals with elasticated heel straps and cork wedge heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1.5 cm, heel 10.5 cm.
Hairband in a shimmering weave with a knot detail at the top and covered elastication at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Wide top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, pile-lined coat in imitation suede with a hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and a single back vent.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a racer back. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Key pocket with a concealed zip, and reflective details.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a wrapover front with soft draping at the top. Seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets, and wide, 3/4-length legs.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
